languages.text: "Как ты спасся, если весь конвой погиб?"
"How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"
languages.original_text: "Как ты спасся, если весь конвой погиб?"

traits.locale_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"
"How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"
"How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"
"How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"
"How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"
"How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

languages.text: "Wie konntet Ihr lebend entkommen, wenn Euer gesamte Konvoi gestorben ist?"
languages.original_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie konntet Ihr lebend entkommen, wenn Euer gesamte Konvoi gestorben ist?"

languages.text: « Comment vous en êtes-vous tiré, si tout votre convoi a péri ? »
languages.original_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment vous en êtes-vous tiré, si tout votre convoi a péri ? »

languages.text: “你的整支小队都被消灭了，你是怎么活着逃出来的？”
languages.original_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

traits.locale_text: “你的整支小队都被消灭了，你是怎么活着逃出来的？”

languages.text: 「お前の隊列が全滅したというのに、どうやって生きて帰れたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の隊列が全滅したというのに、どうやって生きて帰れたんだ？」

languages.text: «¿Cómo salió con vida si todo el convoy murió?».
languages.original_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo salió con vida si todo el convoy murió?».

languages.text: "Madem bütün konvoy öldü, sen nasıl sağ çıkabildin?"
languages.original_text: "How did you make it out alive if your entire convoy perished?"

traits.locale_text: "Madem bütün konvoy öldü, sen nasıl sağ çıkabildin?"
